body_html:
@jtopor and @inflation
I have same problem. I want to add one more layer, change kernel-size from 5x5 to 3x3 but It gives me same error. I just can change batch-size, learning-rate and dropout.
Could you figure out how we can change parameters base on our data set? or just leave this code and work on other code?
Any help would be greatly appreciate.

body:
@jtopor and @inflation 
I have same problem. I want to add one more layer, change kernel-size from 5x5 to 3x3 but It gives me same error. I just can change batch-size, learning-rate and dropout.
Could you figure out how we can change parameters base on our data set? or just leave this code and work on other code? 
Any help would be greatly appreciate.
